parameter.name: trigger
parameter.label: trigger
parameter.description: Update channel values only if the polled value matches this after transformation. With received commands only commands matching this trigger are processed. Use asterisk (*) to match all

parameter.name: transform
parameter.label: transform
parameter.description: Transformation to apply to received commands and polled state. Use "default" to communicate that no transformation is done and value should be passed as is. Use SERVICENAME(ARG) to use transformation service. Any other value than the above types will be interpreted as static text, in which case the actual content of the command/polled value is ignored.

parameter.name: updateUnchangedItems
parameter.label: updateUnchangedItems
parameter.description: Whether to update channels even if the channel value did not change
